post_detail.title: Director, Vellas, winner of five 2013 Lions, signs to Click 3X
post_detail.description: Click 3X is honored to welcome Brazilian Director, Vellas, to our live action roster. Vellas' spot Leica 'Soul' won five 2013 Cannes Lions.  Additionally, he was featured in the Saatchi & Saatchi New Director's Showcase.  Vellas will be exclusively represented by Click 3X in the US & Canada.

assets.title: Director, Vellas, winner of five 2013 Lions, signs to Click 3X
